dmca.title: Copyright Claims - www.celebsextapes.org
dmca.body:
_____  

From: Peter Jakab [mailto:ptrjakab@yahoo.com] 
Sent: Monday, April 04, 2005 8:36 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; legal@theplanet.com; legal@enom.com
Subject: Copyright Claims - www.celebsextapes.org



RE:  Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA) Notice


 

URLs Bearing Infringing Materials:   www.celebsextapes.org
<http://www.celebsextapes.org/> 

http://www.celebsextapes.org/Carrie-Tucker-Sex-Tape.html

 <http://www.celebflix.com/>  

IP Address:  67.18.135.198

Name Server:  DNS1.NAME-SERVICES.COM ( 63.251.163.102)

Name Server:  DNS2.NAME-SERVICES.COM (216.52.184.230)

Name Server:  DNS3.NAME-SERVICES.COM (63.251.83.36)

Name Server:  DNS4.NAME-SERVICES.COM (64.74.96.242)

Name Server:  DNS5.NAME-SERVICES.COM (212.118.243.118)

 

Dear Sir or Madam:

 

We represent Carrie Tucker.   It has come to our attention that the website
pages bearing the URL above have been copying, displaying, distributing,
and/or linking to videotapes or their digitized versions, containing
likenesses of Carrie Tucker (Videos) and still photographs containing
likenesses of Carrie Tucker (Photos).

 

The Videos and Photos are all the exclusive copyrighted work of Ms. Tucker.
Ms. Tucker's copyrights to the Videos and Photos have all been filed for
registration by the U.S. Copyright Office.   

 

I have a good faith belief that the copying, displaying, distributing,
selling, and/or linking to the Videos and Photos on the Internet (or
anywhere else) constitutes willful and unlawful infringement of Ms. Tuckers
copyrights.  Neither Ms. Tucker, nor the Videos' co-producer (see attached
affidavit) has ever granted a license or permission of any kind to any
person or entity. 

 

Please immediately and permanently remove or disable all access to the
Videos and Photos contained on the above websites. 

 

I acknowledge that the above-stated information is true and accurate under
penalty of perjury and that I am authorized to act on behalf of the
copyright holder, Ms. Tucker.

 

/S/

PETER JAKAB

cc: Ms. Carrie Tucker

PETER JAKAB

FEIN & JAKAB
